replies.body: We've been calling each other best friends for over a year now. Alot of Apollo members have also been joking about it alot. She really only opens up to me and when she does we have got very long sessions. Even through bad times when she gets all blue, I will always be there to help her and fix her. Everyday I am coming home there is nothing exciting me more then talking to her again. She always draws in such a high quality and so realistic, you can throw any idea at her.
